a.n: Jeff Healey Band: Live in Belgium 1993

p.d: Filmed in July 1993 at the Peer Blues Festival in Belgium, "Live In Belgium" captures the band touring in support of their album "Feel This". The Jeff Healey Band normally performed as a trio but here they take to the stage with the addition of two backing singers and a keyboards player giving the songs a greater depth and range and taking the whole band up to a new level.
